channel.title: My Story on Home
channel.description: Recent content in My Story on Home

item.title: About me
item.description: I am a dedicated and flexible software engineer that graduated with a bachelor’s degree in Software Engineering, I have more than 8 years of commercial experience with a wide range of team size in software development. Meanwhile, I’m eager to learn and enjoy my work.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello World, I’ll start blogging about software development, engineering, and my experiences.
